verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, stating

\w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w These|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* say, ‘\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:

“\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H2088"\w* yourselves \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* \w paneled|strong="H5603"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w while|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* lies \w in|strong="H3427"\w* ruins?”

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Consider|strong="H7760"\w* \w carefully|strong="H3824"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3847"\w* \w have|strong="H4592"\w* \w planted|strong="H2232"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* but harvested \w little|strong="H4592"\w*. \w You|strong="H3847"\w* eat but never \w have|strong="H4592"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w*. \w You|strong="H3847"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* but never \w have|strong="H4592"\w* \w your|strong="H7235"\w* fill. \w You|strong="H3847"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w clothes|strong="H3847"\w* but never get \w warm|strong="H2527"\w*. \w You|strong="H3847"\w* earn \w wages|strong="H7936"\w* \w to|strong="H7235"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* into \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bag|strong="H6872"\w* \w pierced|strong="H5344"\w* \w through|strong="H5344"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Consider|strong="H7760"\w* \w carefully|strong="H3824"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* down lumber, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5927"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* expected \w much|strong="H7235"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* amounted \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w brought|strong="H7323"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* blew \w away|strong="H6437"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w*? \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* still lies \w in|strong="H3068"\w* ruins, \w while|strong="H4592"\w* each \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* busy \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w withheld|strong="H3607"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w has|strong="H8064"\w* \w withheld|strong="H3607"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w crops|strong="H2981"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drought|strong="H2721"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fields \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w*, \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground yields, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H2022"\w* beast, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w labor|strong="H3018"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* well \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w message|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w stirred|strong="H5782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* well \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w began|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w twenty-fourth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*.
